content.raw:
This is not satisfactory at the moment because [this bug](https://gitlab.com/python-devs/importlib_metadata/issues/43) in importlib\_metadata means it does not work with all packages. I don’t think I will change anything about how this PRw works - there is basicaly no other way to do this, so the bug in importlib\_metadata would need to be fixed if we want to check versions without importing modules.

At the moment none of the packages we use have this issue, but still. Maybe I will fix the bug in importlib\_metadata \(which is included in anaconda and en-route to being a standard library module in Python 3.8\). In any case let’s not merge this yet.

Edit: [pull request](https://gitlab.com/python-devs/importlib_metadata/merge_requests/38) submitted to fix importlib\_metadata.
